support.title: Deadstock Support
support.sub_heading: Hi, how can we help you?

live_chat.title: Live Chat
live_chat.description: Deadstock offers 24/7 live support to help customers get answers in real time.
live_chat.description2: You can chat with our live agents for answers to frequently asked questions, products, order status and more!
live_chat.any_questions: Have a question? Get in touch with us!

about_us.title: About Us
about_us.description: Deadstock™ is a streetwear platform built by sneakerheads for sneakerheads. Founded in 2021, Deadstock has quickly expanded to now have warehouse locations in Los Angeles, New York, and Atlanta.
about_us.description2: Our mission is to build the world’s most trustworthy, secure, and technologically advanced platform for sneakerheads and streetwear fanatics. Combining innovation and next-generation technology, Deadstock brings the highest level of authentication in the market to offer the utmost security and optimized user experience. Every single sneaker, accessory, and clothing item is authenticated in-house by our expert authenticators, as well as by using AI-backed technology and Blockchain systems paired with NFC tags (patent pending #63/203,260).
about_us.description3: With Deadstock, users can buy, sell, and trade authentic sneakers, streetwear, and accessories securely and confidently, as our 100% authenticity guarantee backs all purchases. We only authenticate sneakers, clothing, and accessories that are brand new and unworn, so that our sellers, buyers, and traders are always guaranteed real-deal products in high quality and mint condition.
about_us.any_questions: Have a question? Get in touch with us!

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: The following Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) are effective from June 29, 2021 and shall be updated from time to time as needed.
faq.any_questions: Have a question? Get in touch with us!

contact_us.title: Contact Us
contact_us.description: Our customer service team is dedicated to providing you support for any questions and concerns you may have about your recent purchase or sale and general inquiries. With around-the-clock support, you can always connect with one of our representatives for any inquiries you may have.
contact_us.description2: 'Our Customer Service Department can be reached via phone during our hours of operation: Monday-Friday from 8:30AM-5PM PST.
contact_us.description3: Although our goal is to respond and assist you within 24 hours, response times may vary. We do our best to answer responses in the order that they are received.
contact_us.support_team: Support is also available outside business hours and for users outside of the United States via our 24/7 Live Chat feature.

navigation_links.contact_desc: Send an email to our customer support team

features.heatcheck_desc: Earn 200 Points just for signing up. Get a special gift on your birthday.

payment_plans.desc: Complete your purchase using installment payment plans
payment_plans.increased_affordability_desc: Use installment plans to divide your purchase into more affordable payments.
payment_plans.quick_approval_desc: Receive approval of your installment payment plan immeditely during your checkout.
payment_plans.custom_plans_desc: Divide your plan into four seperate payments, or pay off your purchase whenever you’re ready.
payment_plans.how_affirm_work_desc: Affirms gives you the option to split your purchase into smaller payments over the course of 3 months, 6 months, etc.
payment_plans.apr_and_fees_desc: There are no fees for using affirm, you are only charged late fees if you fail to make a payment. APR rates range from 0-30% depending on credit history.
payment_plans.returns_desc: Return your item at anytime, you will be refunded the money you’ve already paid.
payment_plans.how_afterpay_work_desc: Split your purchase into four seperate payments which are due every two weeks.
payment_plans.afterpay_apr_and_fees_desc: There are no fees for using Afterpay, you are only charged late fees if you fail to make a payment. Afterpay does not effect your credit and does not charge interest.
payment_plans.afterpay_returns_desc: Return your item and receive a full refund of any payments made, all future payments will be cancelled.
payment_plans.shop_desc1: Shop our Footware and streetware collection and choose
payment_plans.shop_desc2: at Checkout to apply for their offerings

buying.title: Buying (Shop) on Deadstock
buying.certified_authentic_products_desc: All of our products are placed in our authentication process and authenticated by our experts. Feel safe with your purchases as we guarantee 100% authentication and satisfaction.
buying.live_customer_service_desc: We offer 24 hour live customer service where you can speak with an actual person to help you resolve any issues, questions or concerns.
buying.blockchain_backed_photo_desc: With our new NFC Blockchain feature exclusive to Deadstock, scan the NFC on each sneaker and be directed to a page with the shoe details and proof of authentication.
buying.shop_desc: Check out various ways of shopping today. We also offer robust payment options, such as
buying.buy_now_desc: Buy eveything from sneakers, apparel, accessories, streetwear and more.
buying.add_to_bag_desc: Secure items you’d like to purchase by adding them to your cart.
buying.make_an_offer_desc: Place an offer on eligible items to get a better deal.

selling.title: Selling on Deadstock
selling.immediate_payout_desc: Receive your payout immediately after the transaction is completed.
selling.low_fees_desc: The lowest seller fees in the marketplace, keep more of your revenue.
selling.fast_shipping_desc: Detailed instructions on how to quickly and efficiently ship your items.
selling.create_listing_desc: List your items with pricing and box/package conditions.
selling.sell_items_desc: Sell at your listed price or at the price of offers sent your way.
selling.ship_items_desc: Recieve detailed instructions on how to properly ship your item.
selling.earn_commission_desc: Receive commission and earn revenue from your sales.
selling.sell_desc: Apply to become a vendor and earn  commission on selling Footware, Apparel, and Accessories today

auctions.title: Auctions On Deadstock
auctions.desc: Place bids or sell items through our auctions
auctions.flexibility_desc: Deadstock offers bidding on single item auctions or entire collections, paired with a variety of bidding methods.
auctions.higher_revenues_desc: Auctions tend to allow Sellers to sell more items in a quicker time frame.
auctions.certified_authentic_products_desc: Every item is authenticated by our experts through our authentication process. 100% verification guranteed.
auctions.low_costs_desc: Auctions can lead to items being sold at lower pricing points.
auctions.authenticated_products_desc: Each item is authenticated by our experts through our authentication process.
auctions.auto_bidding_desc: Enable auto-bidding to automatically keep bidding up to a certain value.
auctions.increased_visibility_desc: Our marketplace of international buyers offers more potential buyers.
auctions.starting_bid_desc: Create a starting bid price and place minimum bidding incraments.
auctions.flexibility_desc2: Auction your items individually with a single item auction or in an entire collection and set your preferred duration.
auctions.explore_desc: Explore the excitment now by checking out our Single-Item and Collection Auctions for Footware, Apparel and Accessories.

heat_check.title: Heat Check
heat_check.desc: Have your sneakers authenticated at your convenience
heat_check.upload_photos_desc: Have your sneakers authenticated on the go, with our detailed templates and instructions on how to upload the proper photos for verification.
heat_check.have_confidence: Have Confidence your items are Authentic
heat_check.have_confidence_desc: Our expert authenticators verify each item through our authentication process.
heat_check.access_to_certification: Get Access to the Deadstock Certification
heat_check.access_to_certification_desc: Receive our certification and be assured your sneaker will be universally viewed as authentic.
heat_check.enter_sku_desc: Access our database by search or SKU.
heat_check.take_photos_desc: Upload photos and receive authentication on the go.
heat_check.quick_results_desc: Receive quick and convenient verification by our experts.
heat_check.share_results_desc: Share your proof of authentication with a shareable link.
heat_check.heatcheck_desc: Authenticate your Products quickly and easily with Deadstock Heat Check. Get quick results and a certificate of authentication if your item is authentic.

trading.title: Trading on Deadstock
trading.first_of_its_kind_desc: The first platform that enables you to trade sneakers, apparel, streetwear and accessories.
trading.value_meter_desc: Our fair trade meter uses live analytics to help create the most compatible trades and assure equal transactions.
trading.certified_authentic_products_desc: Trade with confidence as all of our traded items are placed in our authentication process and authenticated by our experts.
trading.trade_desc: Explore our trade arena, utilize our fair trade meter and start trading items today.

crypto_payments.title: Crypto Payments
crypto_payments.desc: Use Crypto as a form of payment
crypto_payments.secure_transactions_desc: 100% safety and satisfaction guranteed with all Crypto transactions.
crypto_payments.international_buying_desc: Crypto enables easier transactions for international users and trades with global buyers.
crypto_payments.transactional_freedom_desc: Cryptocurrency is not tied to any bank or centralized agency, so you can experience true transactional freedom.

faq_1.title: What is two-factor authentication?
faq_1.body: Two-factor authentication provides an extra layer of security to your online accounts by verifying your identity using a second factor (e.g., your phone or other mobile device that belongs to you) to prevent anyone other than you from logging in, even if your password is compromised.

faq_2.title: Why use two-factor authentication?
faq_2.body: As passwords are becoming increasingly easy to compromise - stolen, guessed, or hacked - someone may be accessing your account without your knowledge. With two-factor authentication, even if your password has been compromised, a second layer of security is provided to keep your account secure - as you'll be alerted right away on your phone or other mobile device if someone attempts to log in as you.

faq_3.title: Can all Deadstock users set up two-factor authentication?
faq_3.body: Can all Deadstock users set up two-factor authentication?', 'body':'Yes, two-factor authentication is available on the Deadstock app via any iOS and Android device serving as the second factor to verify your identity when logging in.

faq_4.title: Is two-factor authentication free?
faq_4.body: Two-step authentication is available on the Deadstock app free of cost to its users.
